item.title: Tax the land
item.description: So how could a land value tax help fix this? Under a land value tax system, proponents say property owners would be clamoring to be allowed to develop their land more intensely ‚Äî leading to more homes being built.

item.title: The impact of the Pink Elephant Paradox
item.description: This is called the Pink Elephant Paradox. Learning how to manage obsessive or intrusive thoughts can help you to avoid the associated pitfalls of negative emotions, distractibility, and poor decision-making.
